title: Macklemore and Russell Wilson in new Bose headphones ad
text:
Macklemore and Russell Wilson in new Bose headphones ad The commercial shows a day in the life of Wilson with Macklemore serving as narrator. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Macklemore and Russell Wilson in new Bose headphones ad <!--iframe--> Travis Pittman, KING 5 News 1:15 p.m. PDT October 15, 2015 Macklemore and Russell Wilson appear in Bose headphones commercial. (Photo: Bose) 1 CONNECT 5 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
SEATTLE – Seahawks quarterback Russell Wilson and Seattle-based rapper Macklemore have teamed up in a new ad for Bose wireless headphones. 
The commercial shows a day in the life of Wilson – making a smoothie, dipping his feet in the pool, watching a bird in his birdbath, and listening to music on his headphones. 
Macklemore serves as the narrator and pep talker, watching Wilson the whole time -- even standing chest-deep in the pool while wearing a leather jacket. 
The ad concludes with Macklemore & Ryan Lewis’ new single “Downtown.”
